attributes.action: Accept the results of the EU Referendum and do not hold a second Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
A petition has already begun demanding for a second referendum - this in itself is counter-productive to democracy and take's the British people on a path that potentially never ends.

A referendum was called, the majority voted to LEAVE.

If a second referendum was called whats to say a third referendum would not be asked for directly after the next votes were counted.
attributes.background:
On June 23rd 2016 the people of Britain took part in a referendum to decide whether Britain should remain or leave the European Union.

The majority decision was to LEAVE the EU. 

Please SIGN this petition to keep what little Democracy we have left
